places.name: Gateway of India
places.historical_info: Built in 1924 to commemorate King George V's visit to India.
places.tourism_info: Famous waterfront landmark and popular tourist destination.

places.name: Hawa Mahal
places.historical_info: Built in 1799 as an extension of the Royal City Palace.
places.tourism_info: Famous for its unique architecture and cultural significance.

places.name: Siddhakshetra Tarangaji
places.address: Shri Digambar Jain Siddha Kshetra Kothi, Tarangaji, Mu. Post- Taranga Temple, Tehsil- Satlasana, Dist- Mehsana (Gujarat) Pin - 384350

facilities.dining_room: Paid, Regular - For 150 Passengers at a Time

transportation.railway_station: Mehsana-Tarangahill-Taranga Temple - 12 km, Mehsana - 70 km, Palanpur - 75 km
transportation.easiest_way: Road: Taranga Temple-Timba Highway - 4 km from Ahmedabad via Gandhinagar, Visnagar Kheralu - Timba

management.institution: Shri Digambar Jain Siddha Kshetra Tarangaji Managing Committee

importance.mountains: Two mountains - Kotishila (700 steps), Siddh Shila (600 steps). Provision for palanquin and lap.
importance.historic_info: 21 temples including Koti Shila and Siddh Shila. Varadatta, Sayadatta, and Varang Kevali Muniraj attained salvation here. Main deity is Bhagwan Sambhavnath.
importance.special_information: Fair is held every year on Kartik Purnima. Sant Niwas includes 10 rooms and a discourse hall for 350 people.
